review_data.title: Bar is ok - Bartender not even close
review_data.content: If I have to face such an arrogant and moody bar tender, I prefer to prepare a drink at home instead. I had the impression, she was pissed, for no reason. Have a smile, be kind, or change your job.

review_data.title: Schöne Nachbarschaftsbar
review_data.content: Perfekter Ort für After-Work-Drinks oder für ein Wochenende mit Freunden. Immer eine sehr gute Stimmung.

review_data.title: Eifach immer guet

review_data.title: Nice beer and finger food
review_data.content: Was here today with a friend for a beer and some food. Was a really enjoyable evening. Beer and food were good. Service was also good. Will be back

review_data.title: Gut für ein Bier am Feierabend
review_data.content: Ruhig mit Sitzmöglichkeiten draussen. Freundliches Personal. Gut um ein Bier zu trinken mit Freunden.

review_data.title: Lively local cafe bar with tapas

review_data.title: quiet and cozy

review_data.title: Nice bar to spend a relax night or starting you evening in the weekend
review_data.content: It is a nice bar with friendly staff. You can find good beers and nice wine for a good value for money. One of my favorite bar in Zurich when I want have a chat with friends and spend some time in a bar. There...More

review_data.title: Classic student bar
review_data.content: Might be unfair, but I'd call this great bar near to bahnhof Wiedikon a classic student bar. Cheap bottled beer (wide selection), with casual seating and slightly chaotic interior, a mixed but youngish crowd of drinking most nights. It's one of my favorite bars in...More

review_data.title: A cozy spot to relax and have a beverage
review_data.content: Si O No, is located near Wiedikon bahnhof and has an entrance on each side of this angled corner bar. There was a friendly female host working during my visit and she also spoke English. The place is really cool, it has dark wood tables,...More
